definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be kindled, burn (Aram. [[יְקַד]], yiqed, burn, intrans.; Ar. waqada, id.)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יֵקַד]] Is 10:16; 3 fs. [[וַתִּיקַד]] De 32:22; Pt. act. f. [[יׁקֶ֫דֶת]] Is 65:5; pass. [[יׇקוּד]] Is 30:14; —be kindled, fig. of judgment, [[יֵקַד יְקׂד כִּיקוֹד אֵשׁ]] Is 10:16; so burn, De 32:22 a fire hath been kindled ([[קָֽדְחָה]]) in my wrath, [[וַּתִּיקַר עַד־שְׁאוֹל]] and it burneth unto shₑ’ôl; fig. of people displeasing to ´[[י]], [[אֵלֶּה עָשָׁן בְּאַפִּי]] [[אֵשׁ יׁקֶדֶת כָּל־הַיּוֹם]] Is 65:5; pt. [[יׇקוּד]] kindled, as subst. [[לַחְהתּוֹת אֵשׁ מִיׇּקוּד]] Is 30:14 to take fire from that which is knidled, i.e. from the hearth (Lg:BN 60).

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[תּוּקַד]] Le 6:2, Le 6:5, Le 6:6; [[תּוּקָָד]] Je 15:14, Je 17:4; —be burning, burn, of (perpetual) altar-fire Le 6:2, Le 6:5, Le 6:6 (P); fig. of ´[[י]]'s judgment, [[אֵשׁ קָֽדְחָה בְּאַפִּי]] [[עֲלֵיכֶם תּוּקָָר]] Je 15:14, similarly Je 17:4 (cf. De 32:22 supr., as prob. source of both).
